summary: Completed comprehensive testing of colaboreaza.ro reverse influencer marketplace MVP. Backend APIs fully functional (19/19 tests passed), frontend UI working with Romanian default language and English toggle. Registration flow works, but login has frontend integration issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Login API call fails with 'Failed to execute json on Response: body stream already read' error

integration_issues.issue: Login form submission not properly handling API response

passed_tests: Landing page loads with Romanian default language
Language toggle switches between RO/EN correctly
All backend API endpoints (19/19 tests passed)
User registration flow for brand users
Public collaborations listing page displays correctly
Pricing page with all three plans (Free, PRO, Featured)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix login form API response handling issue - the frontend is trying to parse JSON response twice, causing 'body stream already read' error. Check AuthContext login method for proper response handling.
